cast.name: 奥尔雯·凯瑟琳·凯莉 Olwen Catherine Kelly

this_title: Why Life Sucks When You're in Your 20s
introduction: Chris and Sean are 2 friends, sharing a flat and trying to find their place in life. They encounter all kinds of recognizable situations like technology taking over, people without consideration for others, losing personal connection with your friends, etc... They try their best to stay the same, stay young. But eventually everybody has to grow up.
chinese_title: Why Life Sucks When You're in Your 20s
